item.title: By: Joel Huffstutler
item.dc:creator: Joel Huffstutler
item.description:
Andreas Kostenberger briefly develops the mountain theme in the Gospel of the King (Matthew) in his work Salvation to the Ends of the Earth: A Biblical Theology of Mission (Intervarsity, 2001), perhaps following T.L. Donaldson's "Jesus on the Mountain: a Study in Matthean Theology," JSOT Press, Sheffield.
To A.K.' list I added at least one other observation below:
Mountain of Temptation (Matt 4:8) Mountain of Teaching (Matt 5:1) Mountain of Prayer (Matt 14:23) Mountain of Ministry (Matt 15:29) Mountain of Transfiguration (Matt 17:1) Mountain of Instruction (Matt 24:3) Mountain of Suffering (Matt 26:30ff.) Mountain of Commission (Matt 28:16)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Chuck Bengtson
item.dc:creator: Chuck Bengtson
item.description:
Jesus is the great mountain:
"While you were watching, a rock was cut out, but not by human hands...But the rock that struck the statue became a huge mountain and filled the whole earth" (Daniel 2:34-35, NIV).
Chuck B
